name: MineSweeper GAME - classic mine sweeper.
description:
Minesweeper Game by modelivesky.com

 

You are a sapper, your goal is to mark all the bombs on the map.

Ivy accompanies you every step of the way.

Be quick, use the sapper panel, cutter and metal detector.

Each level has its own access code.

Make it before the bomb explodes.

Good luck!

 

GAME FEATURES

- Use AWSD to move.

- R to use safe cutter.

- X to use metal detector.

 

- Three music backgrounds.

- Relaxing and aesthetic.

 

If you like it, please support me :-)

 

For more details, please visit modelivesky.com

or modelivesky.itch.io
